name: Defiway
description: The Defiway ecosystem consists of DeFi products: fast cross-chain bridge with low fees. Defiway Wallet is the all-in-one crypto wallet that offers complete financial freedom (available on AppStore). Defiway Pay allows businesses and individuals to accept crypto payments online securely and cost-effectively across the globe. Defiway's PayRoll product allows you to send freelance commissions, affiliate rewards, and employee payrolls with your crypto wallet. DEFI token (10,000,000 max supply) becomes a prominent part of Defiway ecosystem.
